title: Presentation: Poster Presentations Workshop (Skills for Student Success)

media:group.media:title: Presentation: Poster Presentations Workshop (Skills for Student Success)
media:group.media:description:
Recording of an online session dealing with preparing scientific posters.  The audience for this presentation was a group of senior undergraduate students, who would be presenting their own research at the end of that term.

In the presentation, I deal with tips for good visual presentation of your content, we critique some sample of posters, and we go over some tips for the actual verbal portion of the poster presentation.
